relevance_explanation: All branches and tool calls irrelevant to this customer were correctly removed. For example, the suspended account branch was removed because the customer's account status is active. The late fee waiver logic was removed because the customer is not eligible.
completeness_explanation: The routine is mostly complete, but step 11 from the full routine offering a payment plan should have been included. The customer does not have an active payment plan, so they should be asked if they want to set one up.
